system_prompt: Maximum information density. No filler words, no elaboration, no examples unless essential. Short sentences. Telegram style. Every word must earn its place. If you can cut a word without losing meaning, cut it.
user_prompt: Write about: The appeal of horror fiction
generated_text:
Fear fuels imagination.
Horror fiction taps primal emotions.
Escapism through terror.
Release of pent-up anxiety.
Catharsis through fear.
Social commentary in disguise.
Exploration of human darkness.
Unsettling realities revealed.
Psychological complexity.
Emotional investment.
Adrenaline rush.
Escape from mundane life.
Fascination with the unknown.
